code: import React from"react";import Footer from"./Footer";import TodoList from"../components/TodoList";import{useStore}from"laco-react";import{TodoStore,completeAllTodos,clearCompletedTodos,getCompletedCount}from"../stores/todo";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var MainSection=function MainSection(){var _useStore=useStore(TodoStore),todos=_useStore.todos;var todosCount=todos.length;var completedCount=getCompletedCount(todos);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"main",children:[!!todosCount&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"toggle-all",type:"checkbox",defaultChecked:completedCount===todosCount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{onClick:completeAllTodos})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TodoList,{}),!!todosCount&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{completedCount:completedCount,activeCount:todosCount-completedCount,onClearCompleted:clearCompletedTodos})]});};export default MainSection;
